attributes.action: Funding of Biomedical Research into CFS/ME
attributes.additional_details: An independent committee of experts and patient representatives should be set up to oversee government funding for biomedical research  into CFS/ME(not just cognitive. pacing or exercise therapies), and the amount of yearly government funding allocated to biomedical research into CFS/ME should be similar to other similar diseases such as MS, AIDS, Cancer and Parkinson's.
